statements: SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_holder, start_date, end_date FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE coverage_amount > 1000 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, start_date, end_date FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT policy_holder, start_date, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM Policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM Policy ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Claims FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyClaim pc ON p.policy_id = pc.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health' AND coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM Policy WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Policy INNER JOIN PolicyClaim ON Policy.policy_id = PolicyClaim.policy_id WHERE claim_status ='Approved';
SELECT claim_amount, claim_status FROM PolicyClaim WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Policy LEFT JOIN PolicyClaim ON Policy.policy_id = PolicyClaim.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name ORDER BY COUNT(claim_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT company_name FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_id, policyholder_id FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, policy_id, policyholder_name FROM insurance_companies JOIN policyholders ON insurance_companies.company_id = policyholders.policy_id ORDER BY policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_id > 2;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type FROM policies WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.policy_id = policies.policy_id;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_number FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE policyholder_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, address, phone_number FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000;
SELECT policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, dob, address, phone_number FROM Policy_Holders WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, address FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT company_id, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM Policies GROUP BY company_id ORDER BY num_policies DESC;
SELECT ph.name, p.policy_type, c.claim_amount FROM Policy_Holders ph JOIN Policies p ON ph.policy_id = p.policy_id JOIN Claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.status = 'approved';

SELECT pc.name AS policy_holder, pl.policy_type, c.claim_date FROM Policy_Holders pc JOIN Policies pl ON pc.policy_id = pl.policy_id JOIN Claims c ON pl.policy_id = c.policy_id ORDER BY c.claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_holder
SELECT id, name, email FROM policy_holder ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health'
SELECT claim_id, description, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email, company_name FROM agent JOIN insurance_company ON agent.company_id = insurance_company.company_id
SELECT * FROM policy_holder WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM policy_holder WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date, premium FROM policy ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM insurance_company WHERE company_id > 2 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, description, claim_amount, policy_id FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
